## LiquityReceipt type

One of either a [PendingReceipt](./arth-lib-base.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, a [FailedReceipt](./arth-lib-base.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./arth-lib-base.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LiquityReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = PendingReceipt | MinedReceipt<R, D>;
```
